function.name: web_search
function.description: Use this to search the internet for real-time information, current events, news, facts outside your training data, or any general question that you can't properly answer on your own.

query.description: A specific, keyword-rich search query optimized for a search engine.

function.name: open_link
function.description: Retrieve the full text content of a specific URL. Use this to read a specific article, documentation page, or website provided by the user, or to deep-dive into a search result that looks promising.

url.description: The full, valid URL to fetch (e.g., https://example.com/article).

function.name: ignore_message
function.description: Use this if the message doesn't require a response, or violates your instructions.

reason.description: Brief reason for ignoring (for logging purposes).
